con:part.con:content: <definitions targetNamespace="SMSACwsdl" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="serviceList"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:restriction base="SOAP-ENC:Array"> <xsd:attribute ref="SOAP-ENC:arrayType" wsdl:arrayType="tns:services_response[]" xmlns:wsdl1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </types>
